00008 template <class T>
00009 class Vector
00010 {
00011 public:
00012         Vector(){normalized=false;};
00013         Vector(T _x,T _y,T _z):x(_x),y(_y),z(_z){normalized=false;};
00014         ~Vector(){};
00015         
00016         Vector<T>& operator*=(Vector<T> v2){normalized=false;return *(this);};
00017         Vector<T>& operator*=(T s){x*=s;y*=s;z*=s;normalized=false;return *(this);};
00018 
00019         Vector<T>& operator+=(Vector<T> v2){x+=v2.x;y+=v2.y;z+=v2.z;normalized=false;return *(this);};
00020 
00021         float angle(Vector v2){/*if(normalized) return acos(DOT(x,y,z,v2.x,v2.y,v2.z));*/ return ((acos(DOT(x,y,z,v2.x,v2.y,v2.z)))/(MAG(x,y,z)*MAG(v2.x,v2.y,v2.z)));};
00022         void normalize(){/*if(normalized) return;*/T temp = MAG(x,y,z); x /= temp;y /= temp;z /= temp;normalized=true;};
00023         T x,y,z;
00024 protected:
00025         bool normalized;
00026 };

00056         Matrix4x4(Matrix3x3<T> _m, Vector<T> last = new Vector<T>((T)0,(T)0,(T)0), T fill = (T)0){matrix[0][0]=_m.x.x;matrix[0][1]=_m.x.y;matrix[0][2]=_m.x.z;matrix[0][3]=(T)0;
00057                                                                                                 matrix[1][0]=_m.y.x;matrix[1][1]=_m.y.y;matrix[1][2]=_m.y.z;matrix[1][3]=(T)0;
00058                                                                                                 matrix[2][0]=_m.z.x;matrix[2][1]=_m.z.y;matrix[2][2]=_m.z.z;matrix[2][3]=(T)0;
00059                                                                                                 matrix[3][0]= last.x;matrix[3][1]= last.y;matrix[3][2]= last.z;matrix[3][3]=(T)0; delete last;};
